attributes.action: Theresa May to express her actual opinions on Donald Trump ( U.S. President.)
attributes.background: May is taking a policy of not expressing opinions on Trumps extreme policy moves. Democracy is threatened when leaders will not speak against extremist policies for the sake of short term trade interests. May condemned Trump when he was not in power, she should show backbone and do the same now.

rejection.details:
If you would like the UK Government to condemn President Trump's actions, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178852
